website_summaries.verdict: A delicious version of the popular health snack that can't be beat in price and doesn't compromise on quality.
pros: We were impressed with the quality packaging provided by Manitoba Harvest – no moisture sneaks into the bag
These seeds last a long time in the fridge as well
The flavor is on point with many of the more expensive options on the market
We found these seeds blend completely in most blenders
cons: If blending into smoothies, some of the lower-end blenders leave pieces of seed in your drink

customer_reviews.title: ... hemp seeds and 2-3 cups water for the most amazing plant-based milk
customer_reviews.text: Blend 1 cup hemp seeds and 2-3 cups water for the most amazing plant-based milk. Add a teaspoon of agave syrup for added flavor. NO STRAINING REQUIRED :) Shake before use, the pulps make it taste richer and creamier.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Stated my 74 year old mom on this. Her ...
customer_reviews.text: Stated my 74 year old mom on this. Her blood work before hand showed high cholesterol. The Dr wanted to put her on meds. We tried this first. At her next appointment three months later, her blood work showed she had normal level cholesterol!
customer_reviews.author: katpink

customer_reviews.title: Healthy way to fight hunger
customer_reviews.text: Being on a limited income and having limited appliances for cooking and storing. A small refrigerator and a microwave I have a problem with being able to buy enough food to get me through the month. Manitoba hemp seeds are a great way to get through the month. Used with yogurt, sprinkled over salad,add it to oatmeal after it's cooked or just take a teaspoon and put it in your mouth and let it soak before swallowing it can relieve hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Harry W. White II

customer_reviews.title: HEMP is Grown w/o Pesticides Regardless of Organic Certification
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, mostly I want to add that hemp doesn't need to be purchased organically. I researched on a hemp site and found this quote, ""Hemp does not require pesticides: while half the pollutants in the U.S. Today are sprayed on cotton plants, hemp is naturally mildew resistant, requires no pesticides, and maintains a healthy environment for the surrounding streams, air, flora and fauna." I'm very tired of companies charging extra for an unnecessary organic claim which is used to earn them profit.
customer_reviews.author: Raynebow Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Yum and super nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: I can feel and see a big difference in just a short time eating these. I'm more alert, have more energy and sleep better. My nails are growing long and strong and skin looks amazing too! These are nature's most super superfood!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: normal blood pressure and gettin skinny
customer_reviews.text: I bought MH hemp hearts to hopefully drop my blood pressure. I can honestly say that they worked great. Within 2 weeks my BP was almost perfectly normal. I went ahead and stayed on them and over the last 3 months I have dropped over 60 pounds. Very very pleased with this product. Easiest and healthiest diet I have ever done. Amazon delivers them to my door so I don't even have to go anywhere to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love the benefits and they are numerous. I originally bought hemp seeds to correct hair loss. After 6 months I noticed I was no longer losing hair and it was growing back stronger and thicker. To my surprise, I am energized and I am in better shape then I have been in years. My arms are looking better now then when I was 20 years old and I’m 50.. I have always had a problem with regularity, this took care of that. I used to get painful backaches..about 1 every couple weeks. I haven’t had one for quite a while. I can’t recommend this enough. My doctor is amazed how improved my balance is.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Herring

customer_reviews.title: 24 hour results: less joint pain, less bloat
customer_reviews.text: I have many problems and just yesterday, I started using 1 tsp 3x with meals. - with hemp oil, Reds vitamins, and chondroitin (all ordered from Amazon). In ONE day, I felt energy, and had less pain. This morning I woke with less bloating, and slimmer waist. Yes, in 24 hours. The individual packs are easy to open/close and great for freshness. I love the taste, love the crunch, put in cornflakes. Dog loves it too! Will use FOREVER if this continues! I will post again in 2 weeks, with more results.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to make Hemp Seed Milk which is a great substitute for dairy milk or soy milk
customer_reviews.text: I've been using those hemp seeds to make milk as a substitute for dairy milk or soy milk. All I have to do is to mix them with water and pour them into my Vitamix and viola! Hemp seed milk. 100% natural and very versatile. I use it to make green smoothie, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Satori Girl

customer_reviews.title: This product has provided the 'Missing Ingredients' in my dietary ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has provided the 'Missing Ingredients' in my dietary. Have been taking a variety of supplements for years, but this has been the most immediate punch for energy and recovery for an 83-yr-old man. I take NO prescription or otc drugs. Only used otc painkiller briefly following dental surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Aspire

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for diabetics.
customer_reviews.text: I bought chia seeds, flax seeds and hemp heart seeds to add to my smoothies (protein, meal replacement smoothies). The nutrients added including protein and fiber with low carbs makes all three of these a super food. I highly recommend using them in your smoothies or other cooking. There is no need to soak the hemp heart seeds in water. The shell is already removed and they mix well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Creager

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this product for over a year now. It was recommended to me as a weight loss product. It didn't do anything to help curb my appetite so after being on it for several months, I stopped using it when I ran out. What I did come to find was how much it had been helping my joints. After being off of it for a week or two I had joint pain again, which I thought was being controlled with Glucosamine. You can imagine my surprise when I finally realized what was actually helping me with my joint pain. I've been using this product ever since.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: health benefits includes exceptionally rich essential fatty acids, omega 6, omega 3
customer_reviews.text: Freshness is great, packaging is above par, and the quality of the seeds is good. I use these healthy seeds along with walnuts, blueberries, bone broth protein, collagen protein,along with my super greens to make my meal replacement shake every day! Good for you stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse55

customer_reviews.title: This was a good chance for us to try hemp hearts and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a good chance for us to try hemp hearts and the price was fine, same as I would find at my neighborhood store. I like the idea of hemp hearts as a veg protein (we have vegetarians in my family and it is sometimes hard to get them protein) but I didn't expect that the taste would be so strong and a little off-putting. I was imagining something that could blend a little more into shakes/smoothies and sprinkle on foods, but so far I've tried in a few different ways and the smell and taste is always very evident and not appealing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tola

customer_reviews.title: The perfect protein source
customer_reviews.text: Hemp hearts pack an amazing nutritional punch. There are ten grams of protein in three tablespoons. They also have a lot of Omega 3s and have the ideal Omega 3/Omega 6 ratio. I eat them every day, primarily in smoothies, but you sprinkle them on veggies, salads, or anything else... In a world where most proteins have been vilified, it's nice to be able to rely on this protein source as 100% natural and nutritious. Amazon has a much better price than my local grocery store, especially if you use Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect salad topper
customer_reviews.text: These Hemp hearts by Manitoba are the perfect addition to any dish. Salads, soups, pastas, smoothies....anything you can think of or can be eaten on their own. The texture reminds me of a very soft nut and the taste has a hint of nutty flavor but not overpowering. Once added to food with other flavors the nutty flavor completely disapears.
customer_reviews.author: AIM2284

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tastes amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Have ordered it multiple times. I use it to sprinkle on salads, as a rice substitute and best of all I use it to make hemp butter. My husband loves it and it makes his salads more tasty. He has never complained once, so that says alot. I will continue to order this brand. It's always fresh and smell wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product was short dated. I ordered in October and it expires in December. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Deliciousness!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best way to get my morning started! I love adding these to my yogurt and cereal every morning. They go great with milkshakes, adding a creaminess. I also enjoy eating them by the spoonful. The 5lb bag goes a long way. Once the bag is open I keep it refrigerated to preserve the freshness. If you're looking for a great source of plant based protein and omegas look no further.
customer_reviews.author: D Stamp of Approval 👊

customer_reviews.title: My most recent purchase was rancid.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying hemp hearts from Amazon for a while now, and am always pleased. I don't have access to a place with bulk food, so I rely on Amazon to provide a quality product. This last package was spoiled, and smelled like fish. I tried to go through the return process, but I can only mail it back for a return, rather than throw it away. I won't be buying hemp hearts here again.
customer_reviews.author: zubrickk

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great just remember to store in your fridge or freezer as it suggests in fine print to retain freshness. I discovered this following The Plant Paradox health and weight loss book by Dr. Gundry (I've lost 37 lbs in six months).
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Protein, Fat, Fiber = :-D
customer_reviews.text: 3 tablespoons = 10g PROTEIN plus manganese, magnesium, fiber, fat. It's plant based and it tastes really good. If you're having a salad- include 3 tablespoons and you instantly added 10g protein to your salad...plus fat (which is good for you). You could put it on your desert :). It's so easy. Why wouldn't you? Just 3 tablespoons : • Protein - 10 grams of protein Omega-3 fatty acid - 3000mg ideal ratio for your body to help reduce inflammation • Fiber • 120% daily value of manganese • 50 % magnesium -helps to relax muscles and improve digestion • 50% phosphorus • 25% zinc
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like stale bread crumbs, yuck.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. I've tried mixing it into my yogurt and it tastes like stale bread crumbs. Just can't stomach it. It sat around too long to return for credit, my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A Great Plant Protein
customer_reviews.text: Perfect healthy protein. I add it to my green smoothies and I use it to top yogurt or I mix it in cereal. It has a VERY mild nutty flavor and a soft consistency to it. I store it in the refrigerator to keep it fresh. I'm not sure if the directions state to do that or not but I do. This is a very great product at a great price from a trusty company. I will continually order from this product from them. If this review has helped you at all please let me know. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: phillygrl

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add in healthy fats naturally.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great, healthy add on to so many foods, & you're getting all your good omega's. Just started taking/using them, however I am liking them. Only bad part is I occasionally forget to put some in my foods when I'm really hungry! So far so good! I don't notice the flavor/taste much because I am adding it to foods. Everyone is different.....I'm pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: KMBSRS

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product while using it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product while using it, which was until I saw mouse poop in a bag. Also, buying a single bag I thought there was better taste than when buying in a pack of three.
customer_reviews.author: Wind and Rain Lovin Mama

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the most versitile foods I have ever used. Aside from the health benefits, it is low in calories and carbs. Great in soup, salad, meat, or any other thing you stick it in. It makes a good coating for chicken to give it that crispy crunch. The flavor is a little hard to describe, but it is close to raw pumpkin seeds, just a lighter taste.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Too fine!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t care for it at all! Too finally ground up! Not crunchy! I put it over a protein drink so I think I am actually eating something and it is just to fine!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: I eat this stuff every day. I buy 5 pound, fill two parmesan cheese shaker jars and keep them in the refrigerator. The rest of the bag I keep in the deep freeze. Fill the shakers when empty. I like a GOMS salad. A big bowls of Greens, a small diced Onion, several sliced Mushrooms and four heaping tablespoons of Seeds. The best Seed for me is de-hulled hemp Seeds. The best hemp seeds I've found are Manatoba Harvest, Hemp Hearts. Look, hemp seeds are a good food and when I consistently eat them I FEEL GOOD. I keep the extra weight off too without trying. This stuff it great in shakes too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy - easy to add to toast
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I put them on top of toasted Ezekiel bread, with almond butter/peanut butter, chia seeds, honey, and either sliced strawberries or sliced banana. Sooo good. We've also put them in shakes in the past, although I don't do it much now.
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: I ♥ Hemp Hearts!
customer_reviews.text: Manitoba Harvest's Hemp Hearts are simply raw, shelled hemp seeds. Sprinkle them on salad, cereal or yogurt. Hemp seeds contain an excellent balance (3:1) of Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids which promote good cardiovascular health. Other research shows that hemp seeds are beneficial for the following: 1. Regulation and balance of hormones 2. Weight Loss 3. Reduction in joint pain 4. Reduced inflammation levels 5. Hair, skin and nail health. The flavor is nutty and mild. PROS: Healthy and delicious! CONS: None I highly recommend Manitoba Harvest Hemp Hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Masson

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Protein
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for more plant protein sources, and came across this. I try them all, and this is unique. It doesn't have much of a taste, but works great in oatmeal, raw protein cookies, or regular, or salads, etc. It is a good source of good fats as well if you are trying to eat less carbs, and eat more fat and protein. It is expensive, and it goes quick, is my only critique. The hemp whole plant green protein powder tastes not very good, but this is the seeds, so a different option for various methods.
customer_reviews.author: P Smity

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to mix into my protein shakes for added nutrition. It was recommended by a health expert friend of mine. I've done zero research so I have no proof this adds any benefit to my life or health. I don't know why there is a flavor rating...this stuff has no flavor. One thing is for sure, the bits do not mix into my shake at all. I am left chewing little bits of hemp seeds (albeit soft) at the bottom of my daily shake. Might have been a waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Always Fresh and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Nuts and seeds are the largest part of my daily food intake. I am a cancer survivor, can only stomach small amounts of food so my food has to be nutrient dense. Nuts and seeds are at the top of the list of my food consumption. Sugar and cancer are not a great combination. If there isn't a taste that captivates my tongue, I just can't get it down. These seeds fit right into an eating plan I am able to tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Gram Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tasting, nutrient-dense
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tasting, nutrient-dense, filling product. So healthy. Thankfully it's illegal to grow in my state. In fact, even though hemp has zero ability to get you high, it's classified a schedule 1 drug (up there with heroin and LSD). Thanks, Pennsylvania, for keeping me safe! And thanks Manitoba Harvest for supplying an alternative to prison.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: I am worried about leaving nuts out like this without refrigeration
customer_reviews.text: Tried my hand at hemp milk since we always use coconuts until the storms made them disappear....the hemp milk may be okay for cooking but for drinking out of the glass....not for me. The taste is too "green" for my liking. I think I may stick to coconut when possible, or make a little more almond milk. I will use these in baking to see if I can use them up. Store in the fridge if you live in warm climates. I am worried about leaving nuts out like this without refrigeration, due to potential to become rancid.
customer_reviews.author: T. Butler

customer_reviews.title: My wife & I find it better than flax seed which we were using prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for about 2 months. My wife & I find it better than flax seed which we were using prior to this. Flax seed tends to kling in your mouth but this product is very smooth & doesn't have the problem of flax seed. Did a bit of research prior to buying it & it appears to have all the health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hemp product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hemp product, as everything I have tried from Manitoba Harvest! I love both the flavor and the texture. I add the raw shelled hemp seeds to salads, smoothies, oats, yogurt, baked products. It adds something special to muffins or bread while baking, I really recommend trying to add hemp to baking. Nutritionally, they are a great way to add fats to my macros (better than chia in terms of fat vs. carbs). I don't use a full 30g serving, for me 10g are enough. Did not noticed any strange side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ana MariaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: healthy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what is Hemp foods. Soon got it and open taste it. It is great for your body. I used take many pills. But eat and healthy is better. taste like Nuts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Englebrecht

customer_reviews.title: Good for you and your fur friends!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my oatmeal and for my dogs. Every morning I will put some of this hemp seeds, chia seeds and flaxseeds in my oatmeal along with some yogurt and protein powder for added sweetness. It keep me full for a long time. I also add a little bit to my dog’s dinner everyday, great supplement for dogs too. I already seen shinier fur!!! My dogs loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Billbillman

customer_reviews.title: Strangely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are strangely delicious, even eating them by the spoonfuls, alone. Not quite, but almost a nutty flavor...they’re good.
customer_reviews.author: Just_Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Love Hempseed!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase the smaller bag of this brand at Wholefoods. The serving would only last me for a week, I looked on Amazon to see if I can find a bag with more servings and came across this bag. I add Hempseed to my oatmeal!!! I love the taste! I love this brand, I've never tried another brand so its hard for me to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge bag - great snack! Body builder friendly! Not for the calorie counting people.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing snack food for the health conscious and people who need something to just leave on your desk or as a regular snack. Packed full of nutrients and a delightful, nutty, umami-like flavor, a little goes a long way for just adding some in your diet. Noticed it also helped my digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Avarice of Reading

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, hearty, nutty, low carb
customer_reviews.text: I've been mixing this with my HighKey Snacks Keto Instant Hot Cereal Breakfast (Cinnamon) and microwaving with some milk for a delicious hot breakfast in the morning. I like the nutty oatmeal-like consistency and flavor that I've been missing since I've gone Low Carb. Lots of protein and omegas and very few carbs, what a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Respectful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised By Hemp Hearts
customer_reviews.text: Actually taste really good kind of like a mix of a sunflower seed and a pine nut maybe. They also don't have some of the "side effects" of flaxseeds for me. I normally add a scoop to my cereal, oatmeal, peanut/almond butter sandwich, yogurt, cottage cheese, salads, or just grab a handful to get some easy added protein and omega's. Comes in a quality foil lined bag with a good resealable zipper to keep them fresh for a long time. Nice addition is that they are non-GMO verified. I thought they were a little coarse in a smoothie but that might just be me (probably wouldn't even notice if it had strawberries in it).
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Taste and Quantity
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of shelled hemp seeds since they are highly nutritious and taste great. Kind of like miniature cashews. It's great that Amazon has these available since I used to get them from a particular hemp trading website years ago that sold pretty much anything that is related to the world's most important plant. If you like sunflower seeds, peanuts and cashews, then you'll love hemp hearts. They go great on all kinds of foods, especially salads, soups and chili.
customer_reviews.author: Elak Swindell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I ever purchased hemp hearts. I was glad I did! They are very yummy and have a texture that is a little softer than sunflower seeds, although smaller, and even a tad similar in flavor. Easy way to up the protein in any dish! I add them to yogurt and salads. But would probably also be good thrown into a muffin recipe!
customer_reviews.author: L. K.

customer_reviews.title: A well-received gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who is into natural things and who might have inhaled in college (an old Baby Boomer joke, sorry) and he was very pleased with the thought and said the product was tasty and that he was pleased with the gift. Success!
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. They are a bit bitter and don't really add crunch or texture much at all. I used to top salads and can't say they brought anything positive to the salad in terms of flavor or texture. They weren't awful, but just pretty meh.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like to lightly toast them, the same way you toast pine nuts, and add them to salads. Because of their mild flavor I would even add as a nut sprinkle topping to ice cream or frozen yoghurt or for making a daakar spice mix. Exactly as advertised, very nice addition to the pantry. I keep them in the fridge to maintain freshness. Previously, I had kept them in a regular pantry cupboard and this time I stored them in the fridge. I can definitely tell that the fridge stored ones taste better.
customer_reviews.author: rellZ0r

customer_reviews.title: Tasty flavor, like pine nuts.
customer_reviews.text: When I found this product I was excited to try it, one because it is low in carbs and high in protein. This made a great accompaniment to my breakfast and lunch, keeping me satiated without needing to snack during the day. I've recommended this product to people who are trying to lose weight and keep their appetite suppressed. It also fills you up because of the high protein content, so you don't need to eat as much if you take this with meals.
customer_reviews.author: J C.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Health with Hemp Hearts!
customer_reviews.text: Hemp Hearts is an OUTSTANDING all natural product. It is perhaps the best for the whole digestive system! It provides a settling affect that those with IBS will greatly appreciate. Are you considering colon surgery? STOP! If it can wait a short time start a diet that regularly and consistently includes Hemp Hearts. Talk to a Whole Foods nutritionist (free) about a neutral healthy diet. In a month your life should be much improved. Of course you must consider your personal situation. If you feel you have some time to try this I feel you will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: buildcash

customer_reviews.title: First Experience with Hemp Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I am following a mostly plant-based meal plan and hemp seeds were recommended for smoothies. I've never had hemp seeds before, and I find these delicious and very filling. The price seems fair (if not more than fair) and I can see myself eating these in salads, over desserts, and in baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: Smile SaurusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great on Salad
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a super healthy eater and have been attempting to make some additions to make up for the fact that most of my diet is basically a dumpster fire. This is an excellent, easy, painless addition to salads and soups to give a boost of nutrition without any unsavory flavors or textures.
customer_reviews.author: Tmwarne

customer_reviews.title: Filling and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The nutritional value of these is excellent, with decent amounts of protein and vitamins. They have a seed/nut type of taste and help make food a lot more filling. I love to add these to oatmeal, on salads, in stuffed portobellos, on top of things like pasta and broccoli, and more. They're a super easy way to round out a meal. I would highly recommend to vegetarians, vegans, keto peeps, and well...anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Covers alot of vitamins, minerals in just 3 Tablespoons
customer_reviews.text: This seems to cover alot for my wife. She needed Iron , more protein more Omegas outside the fish oil pills & manganese according to her dr. This bag of hemp should cover to help the deficiency she has. She likes it in her protein shakes that she buys on Amazon only called Quest.
customer_reviews.author: Carnal C

customer_reviews.title: Great for recipes...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. I admit I had to search for some recipes because I didn't know what to do with them but I found a great keto cookie recipe and the hemp hearts are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: B TERRILL

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product- you can smell the freshness when you open and the resealable lining allows you to close sealed and it's always as fresh as the first time. I put these on my salads, yogurts, in my kids and my smoothies, on eggs, it's just a yummy compliment to most foods!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product first time trying this product and I really liked it. Package and shipment was fine. I just had to make sure my husband and son did not use it because I read it shows up like a drug and they get tested for drugs ramdomly at work so didnt want to jeopardize their employment. I would definitely buy again. I aso just sprinkled it on my food especially salads.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha J

customer_reviews.title: Good producte
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my morning smoothie. They blend up well. Sometimes I sprinkle them on a salad. No unpleasant flavor. I would buy them again. I use them for the omega benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good source of vegan protein
customer_reviews.text: I use it evey morning to add vegan protein to my morning shake breakfast with good results since I’m lactose and gluten intolerant. I can go nonstop until lunch thanks to the protein content added using this hemp granules. I ordered it from Amazon and one of the bags was leaking. Amazon promptly replaced that bag at no cost.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with hemp hearts - this is a fantastic product. I use it every day sprinkling the seeds on soups, salads, vegetables,and such savories as eggplant caponata. It's also good added to hot or cold whole grain cereals. Mixed with crunchy sesame seeds, the soft hemp seeds are a delight. The product and its packaging are great. I'll be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Great bulk option for hemp hearts
customer_reviews.text: Love that this a bulk option for hemp hearts. I fill up a quart Mason jar that I keep in the fridge for every day use and toss the rest of the bag in the freezer. My husband and I add these tasty hemp hearts to our smoothies every day. They blend pretty well in our Ninja bullet type cup, but there's still a little texture to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni B.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for daily breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is so healthy. I wish people could be a little bit more open minded and enjoy these healthy little hemp hearts. By blending this with almond milk and banana in the morning, I feel way more energized during the day. Actually I even got too concentrated during the first week. Amazing if you want to feel energized during the day while feeding your body with pure nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: They taste great. I eat them right out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product. I read the Health Benefits of Hemp Hearts and wanted to try. They taste great. I eat them right out of the bag, or sprinkle them on anything that I think that they will go with. I've put them on Salad, Macaroni Salad.Pizza. You name it.Scrambled Eggs ETC. Just for the Taste I love them! Hopefully I get the Health benefits from them also.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a sailing trip. It is a pain to lug around due to its shape and design. The photo makes it seem structured but it is unstructured and has a shape that is difficult to travel with. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The health benefits of hemp seeds are amazing, but for this review, I won't really go into that. I will, however, tell you that hemp seeds are pretty nutty in flavor, and I've found that they provide a nice nuttiness to oat meal. I've purchased hemp seeds from Manitoba Harvest many times, and each time, their product has delivered. They come in a nice, resealable container, and the product has tasted very fresh every time. For storage, I recommend putting the hemp seeds in the fridge after opening. All in all, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Hecox

customer_reviews.title: Adds a light nutty flavor
customer_reviews.text: I found these added a nutty flavor to the foods I added them too, which was nice, sometimes.. I typically added them to my morning green smoothie but the recommended serving made them too thick and altered the flavor way too much. I actually started eating a spoonful by themselves every so often which wasn't bad. I also added to salads to add some texture.
customer_reviews.author: jmcgouldrick

customer_reviews.title: Honestly the best price for the quantity and quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best price for the quantity and quality. Great to add to smoothies, salads, buddah bowls, oatmeal, literally anything. Pros - Amazing deal - Mild flavor - Endless possibilities - Increadably nutrient dense - Large quantity Cons - The seal for the bag could have been manufactured a little better
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that I add to my salads everyday. It does not have a strong taste so you can sprinkle on just about everything. I add it to my dog's food too. The seller was wonderful in resolving an issue I had very quickly and amicably. Thank you so much and I will order again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Atsuko LaPine

customer_reviews.title: So tasty and good for you
customer_reviews.text: Hemp seeds have amazing flavor and texture. I put them in smoothies, on pancakes, on salads, in oatmeal and it raises the level of each food. The nutritional aspects are surprisingly good. Good fats and a high level of protein make this a staple for me.
customer_reviews.author: California girl

customer_reviews.title: Good value, wish bag was bigger
customer_reviews.text: My local grocery store used to carry a large value sized bag, but discontinued it. This is the largest bag I can find on-line, thou I wish I could find the 2.27 kg/5 lb value sized bag. This is a trusted brand and I use these in my soups, salads, post workout smoothies, and in my yogurt. So good...
customer_reviews.author: digduga

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite brand of hemp hearts... great flavor and easy to toss into smoothies, salads, soups, yogurt, etc. They’re always very fresh and come in a resealable bag to keep them that way! A kitchen staple for me that I will continue purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: What a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious addition to my salads and baking. Only complaint is the seal on the packaging doesn't work properly. Got around that issue by folding it down and using a different fastener since I didn't want to spoil freshness using another container. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kath G

customer_reviews.title: Using to make my own hempmilk
customer_reviews.text: Really fresh tasty hemp seed. I use it as a topper for nearly any meal to give added protein. I especially like it on a plate of scrambled eggs or a bowl of chili ! I have also been making my own hempmilk. This works very well for that. Not too "hully" no need to strain.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: No hulls -- NONE
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I don't recall getting any hulls in the three 5-pound bags I've purchased so far. Comes in a quality light-blocking bag, to preserve nutrition qualities. The price is sometimes higher, which is why I buy the bigger bags. What you get for that price is better quality control. I can pop a handful of seeds into my mouth without having hulls wedge in my teeth. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: michael miller

customer_reviews.title: As described, does have a bit of a nutty taste almost. It blends well in smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: As described, does have a bit of a nutty taste almost. It blends well in smoothies, I have yet to try it on a salad. I was thinking of adding it to a snack mix with nuts and seeds etc. It’s made of Hemp, so you can’t get high from eating it LOL but it’s supposed to have a lot of health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: OI

customer_reviews.title: A Superfood
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste, somewhere in between sunflower seeds and cashews. Mixed in salads, soups or eat right out of the bag. Smooth and rich flavor all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality. Great Tasting. Fantastic Value.
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality. Great Tasting. Fantastic Value. We mix the hemp with oatmeal and the flavor is fantastic. If this review helps you, please click HELPFUL. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Executive Director of WindowsHD

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra protein and Omegas
customer_reviews.text: Large bag of beneficial hemp seeds. They have an interesting soft texture without the hard shells. I put them on top of salads, scrambled eggs, in yogurt and smoothies. Reseal the bag and store in the refrigerator. They have a neutral taste so you could add them to any dish.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ro

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Hemp seeds,I use this for my iron supplement since I’ve recently had a baby and I’m low on iron. this is something I will be ordering once a month. I blend this in al my smoothies/shakes, I also put this in my oatmeal and it adds a lot of texture.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My husband had high blood pressure, and was diagnosed with a heart problem. Bypass surgery was recommended. He opted for a natural approach instead. I truly believe hemp hearts have kept him going. His blood pressure has been in the normal range since we have added the hemp hearts in our daily smoothies. And he feels better than he has in a long time. Manitoba Harvest is reasonably priced, we received our order within a week.
customer_reviews.author: MaltaStar

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, immediately after I started using this, the arthritis in my hands and feet almost completely disappeared. I use to wake up unable to use my hands or walk on my feet for several minutes, that is now gone. I add it to my oatmeal each morning, it will now always be a staple in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 80lb mother has been on this for years now and it's great for her. It mixes well with just about everything. I am blown away that in just 2 months the price increased $5.00!!! How is that justifiable? Will look to purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Grammyssunshine

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of hemp hearts! I could buy them at Whole Foods (about $2 more expensive there) but I love getting them through AP delivered right to my door. I put them in gluten free pancakes and add them to steel cut oatmeal. They have a wonderful fullness that bursts in your mouth and adds flavor with fiber. Definitely an easy thing to work into baked goods too!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Diarrhea...
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? I think everybody will understand this
customer_reviews.author: Edward McNamara

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to add protein and fat to my breakfast
customer_reviews.text: An easy way to add protein and fat to my breakfast, dump them in my oatmeal, or smoothie. Whenever I want to switch up egg whites with something else. can barely taste them. Put them in salad as well, as some additional fat. They do tend to stick everywhere in the bowl and end up being washed away.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I thought I will start consuming this on the place of protein powders. It has 10 grams of protein in 3 serving spoons. Then I thought I won't spend extra money for some extra foods. So I will continue with my almonds, curd and milk which have enough protein and which I regularly consume. The seeds are tasty, especially when you season a curd with these.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love these hemp hearts! The taste and texture reminds me of wheat germ, which, for some unknown reason is no longer available on grocery shelves. I added to my sport shakes and not only does it blend perfectly, It thickens the shake. I also added to my oatmeal for extra protein. A little goes a long way. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dr RJP

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised. Affordable and Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a few brands of Hemp proteins. We are pleased with this purchase and like the flexibility of this product. They are tasty on a salad or pasta. They also blend very well in smoothies! We will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Charisha S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Good, fresh-looking, fresh-tasting, whole hemp seeds. I use a tablespoon or two every morning in a fruit/yogurt smoothie, and it disappears right in. High in protein and fiber, stays fresh in the fridge for weeks, and the packaging has a good zip-loc top.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Add-on for Kids Food
customer_reviews.text: I add this into my kids' oatmeal, grilled cheese, smoothies, eggs, desserts, etc. Why? The nutrition profile reads like a multi-vitamin, but it is a whole food. That's extremely rare; you would have to combine multiple whole foods to achieve the same, but my kids can taste (and reject) those! For me, this is a golden tool. Thank you thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Troz

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever tried hemp hearts.......yum!!! Pleasantly surprised!! They are a nice subtle nutty flavor! These are GREAT for getting some extra protein into your diet, especially if your KETO. I’ve added it to yogurt, my pumpkin pudding, and salad....whatever you can think of! I’ll proabbly make hemp hearts a staple in my pantry from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Manitoba Harvest Hemp Hearts are the bomb.com
customer_reviews.text: These are scarily and deliciously addictive. Luckily they're good for you! (Just keep in mind, it's not exactly a low calorie snack). We've taken to topping almost everything with a sprinkling of hemp hearts – from cereal, smoothies and (n)ice cream, to salads and tofu. These have a wonderful, slightly nutty taste and a somewhat chewy texture. Also, Manitoba is a kind corporation, so you can feel good about spending money on their products. Seriously worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Lizjoyiforous

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting them in my smoothie to add protein but its really gritty and throws off the taste of the smoothie. I have a ninja and no matter how long I blend these for it still gives a gritty taste to the smoothie. After this package is gone I'll probably fine something that blends a little better to add protein. As far as the flavor it isn't bad but with how big the pieces are I doubt I'd add it to any food like the package recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Kkgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good topping for almost anything.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the Keto diet and this is a great way to get my Omega fats and other minerals with a flavorless taste. I use it on salad's and stir fry's but it can be put on just about everything. My only complaint is after a little while the reseal bag stopped sealing, so i started using a bag clip for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it. Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting this to taste awful but I actually enjoy it in my fruit smoothies. I bought this as a nursing mom trying to increase milk production after listening to a youtuber swear by it. So far, slight change not dramatic but it does make me feel healthier incorporating it into my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Useful and palatble
customer_reviews.text: Oh hemp seeds, how I treasure you. Actually, how my husband treasures you. He swears by them on: salads, pasta, oats, dry cereals, tuna fish salad, salad dressing, PB&J, pancakes. Me? Eh. It's hemp. This brand seems fresher and more tasty than others.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ives

customer_reviews.title: Product description says gluten free is it?
customer_reviews.text: The description headline for this product says gluten free. The product comparison chart also has gluten free checked. After opening the bag and looking at all side of the bag it says nothing about being gluten free. So at this point seeing it is not on the bag I do not trust this product to be safe to eat for a person with a gluten sensitivity problem. I hope the manufacturer responds with clarification.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best salad topper
customer_reviews.text: I love these, and they are so cheap on Amazon, especially if you subscribe. I love them on salads. I bought some for my dad to blend into smoothies, he got super into smoothies for a hot minute, and he said they did not blend well, which I was really surprised by! Probably because they’re so small to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: allicinwonderland

product_meta.title: Manitoba Harvest Hemp Hearts Shelled Hemp Seeds, 16oz; 10g Plant-Based Protein & 12g Omegas per Serving, Whole 30 Approved, Vegan, Keto, Paleo, Non-GMO, Gluten Free
product_meta.description: Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 1)| *:SeedsThese versatile seeds will add nutrition and a rich nutty taste to any meal! Sprinkle Hemp Hearts on salad, cereal, or yogurt, or blend them into smoothies. Shelling the hemp seed produces the most nutritious and tender part of the seed, the heart. Hemp Hearts taste great, are easy to use, and nutritious too! There’s no need to grind or cook Hemp Hearts, they’re ready to eat straight from the bag and are simple to incorporate into your diet. Try sprinkling them on salads, cereal, or yogurt or blend them into smoothies. The only limit is your imagination. Hemp Hearts may look little, but they contain 10 grams of Plant Based Protein and 10 grams of Omega-3 and Omega-6 per 30 gram serving (more than a comparable serving of flax or chia). Manitoba Harvest is the world’s largest hemp food manufacturer to grow, make and sell our own line of hemp foods. Our producer partners deliver whole seed directly to our state-of-the-art, BRC (the highest level of food safety and quality certification in the world) certified facility. Hemp Hearts, as with all Manitoba Harvest products, is Non-GMO Project Verified.
feature_bullets: HEMP HAS MORE PROTEIN THAN CHICKEN GRAM FOR GRAM AND IT’S A PLANT!: With 10g of plant protein per serving, hemp hearts have two times more protein than chia or flax. These super seeds also offer 12g Omegas 3 & 6 and only 1g of carbs per serving

ESSENTIAL VITAMINS & MINERALS: Hemp is a super seed packed with plant-based protein, healthy fats and other vital nutrients. Hemp Hearts are an excellent source of Iron, Niacin, Thiamine, Phosphorus, Magnesium, Manganese, Copper, and Zinc

VERSATILE & TASTY: Experiencing the benefits of hemp is easy. With a light, nutty flavor that complements almost any dish, Hemp Hearts are the perfect boost to any meal. Sprinkle Hemp Hearts on salad, cereal, yogurt or blend them into smoothies
SHELF-STABLE & READY TO EAT: Manitoba Harvest shelled hemp seeds are shelf-stable and ready to eat, making them a must-have addition to any pantry
A FIT FOR A VARIETY OF DIETS & LIFESTYLES: Non-GMO Project Verified, Keto Certified, Paleo Certified, Gluten Free, Vegan, Whole 30 Approved and Kosher

STRONG VALUES: At Manitoba Harvest we believe in cultivating the world in which we want to live. As a Certified B-Corp with a net zero carbon footprint, sustainability is at the forefront of everything we do

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
